name: EvolutionX
changelog:
• Fixed high brightness issue at low level
  • Fixed media codecs to resolve YouTube lag, enable smooth 60fps video playback, and screen recording with HEVC encoding.
  • MIUI camera module not supported
notes:
• You can perform a dirty flash if you are coming from the previous build
  • UDFPS is broken in Private Space
  • LCD users flash #66hz_to_60hz, Get it from the support group.
